feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
